entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Address diagnostic issues in runtime incremental source generators #92509
    8.0.0
  • CreateObjectFlags.UniqueInstance overrides CreateObjectFlags.Unwrap but this behavior is not documented #92507
  • Clean up dependencies on 8.0 packages. #92502
  • Add AVX/AVX512 to Ordinal.EqualsIgnoreCase #92497
  • [macOS] NativeAOT unable to produce executables when using the Xcode 15 toolchain #92491
    8.0.0
  • Workingset constantly growing, possible unmanaged memory leak #92490
    Future
  • `NullabilityInfoContext` reporting incorrect nullability for `ParameterInfo` of generic types #92487
    Future
  • Incompatible values of the AssemblyVersion attribute in System.Security.Cryptography.Xml 7.0.1 #92486
  • Algorithm 'AesGcm' is not supported on this platform but platform is supported #92482
    Future
  • [mono] System.IO.IsolatedStorage test failures on MacCatalyst #92481
    9.0.0
  • [mono][tvos] OOM in System.IO.Tests.MemoryStreamTests #92467
    9.0.0
  • [Mono]: Crash in interpreter delegate wrapper when calling AOT:ed virtual delegate target method in mixed mode. #92466
  • System.Net.Sockets.SocketException (10014): The system detected an invalid pointer address in attempting to use a pointer argument in a call #92464
    9.0.0
  • (U)Int128 should provide correct op_IntegerDisivion and op_Disivion #92461
  • GCSettings not being honored #92458
  • System.Private.Corelib R2R PDB is not included in runtime pack #92456
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Test failure: Loader\\binding\\tracing\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow\\BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.cmd #92236
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Loader/binding/tracing/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow/BinderTracingTest.ResolutionFlow.sh #92098
    9.0.0
  • [Analyzer proposal]: Simplify calls to string.Substring and Memory/Span.Slice #68946
    Future
  • [wasm] perf pipeline AOT compilation failures #87821
    9.0.0
  • ILLink analyzer handling of IL3003 on properties and events #83235
    9.0.0
  • System.IO.Directory.GetFiles with System.IO.SearchOption.AllDirectories not working on network drive #92152
  • Document tiered compilation events #86826
    8.0.0
  • Document the `Thread_AssignCpuGroups` config var #86596
    8.0.0
  • System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl can't set ACLs on files with long paths #91980
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/3: Hang when reading content or disposing response when SerializeToStreamAsync doesn't complete #92390
    9.0.0
  • Test failure baseservices\\callconvs\\TestCallingConventions\\TestCallingConventions.cmd #78620
    8.0.0
  • RSA.ExportParameters(true) Throw CryptographicException on Redhat 7.9 #90506
    9.0.0
  • [invalid][mono] System.IO.IsolatedStorage test failures on MacCatalyst #92468
    9.0.0
  • Run into `Fatal error. Internal CLR error` when trying to build `System.IO.FileSystem.AccessControl.sln` #92478
  • The "ConvertDllsToWebCil" task failed: System.NotImplementedException on s390x #91893
  • [Mono] LLVM AOT failed to compile System.Private.CoreLib.dll on amd64 #92455
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json.JsonProperty allocated a string in WriteTo() #88767
    Future
  • Statically linked cloud native executables - FROM SCRATCH containers #80654
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Attribute required by library authors to disable trimming on a specific type and all derived types #57231
    Future
  • Provide ALC name in DispatchProxy for proxies in custom ALC #82969
    9.0.0
  • NativeAOT: improve getExactClasses to support classes as base types #88547
    9.0.0
  • Store static fields with `[FixedAddressValueType]` in the Pinned Object Heap. #66043
    Future
  • Configuration binder generator generates source with compilation errors #92453
  • NRE in ConfigurationBinder.BindInstance #92213
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Add missing ArrayPool returns to failure branches #92511
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JitDump improvements and other minor cleanup #92510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch to etw python script #92508
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix asserts about arm64 hardware intrinsic register selection #92505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename get_* to Get* in NativeAOT runtime #92498
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update the way we set `delayRegFree` #92496
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92495
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] `IDispatch` should accept `HRESULT` as valuetype #92494
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Delete FEATURE_MANAGED_ETW_* defines for unmanaged code #92493
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Avoiding trying to load the native library Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.<arch>.dll on Linux #92492
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • `Convert.ToHexStringLower`: lower variant for `Convert.ToHexString` #92483
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [browser] dispose runtime #92480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Generate gsharedvt versions of the callvirt delegate invoke wr… #92472
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization implement japanese calendar data #92471
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter #92470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Support SIMD sizes for remainders in store decomposition #92469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set stack size on MUSL with PT_GNU_STACK header #92465
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump chrome to 117.0.5938.x #92463
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Optimize capturing lambdas in `DependencyContextExtensions` and `DependencyContextJsonReader` #92462
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • Use snprintf in pal_icushim.c #92452
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Support setting ACLs on file paths longer than `MAX_PATH` #92460
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Ensure Bind can handle null from GetSection #92477
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Remove duplicate MicrosoftNETCoreILAsmVersion #92500
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Optimize JitStressOnly #91815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not call SignalSession on invalid session IDs #92431
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • [llvm] Generate valid llvm IR for the DivRem intrinsics. #92457
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [browser] cleanup for emscripten main in a web worker #92280
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92484
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [mono] Try enabling full trimming by default when not using blazor #89110
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Add some convenience classes for node count JIT metrics, and automatic dumping from compShutdown #92112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser] mono runtime already exited with 0 - silence WS #92479
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Endian fix for Webcil #92274
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Simplify analyzer handling of properties/events #92449
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • `IDispatch` should accept `HRESULT` as valuetype #92447
    area-Interop-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Temporarily disable the foreground-shutdown test #92231
    area-System.Threading, 9.0.0
  • [H/3] Remove waiting on tasks from H3 request stream dispose #92410
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Re-enable TestCallingConventions for x86 GCStress #92445
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Do not call SignalSession on invalid session IDs #92444
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Ensure that embedded broadcast checks the base type of the parent node #92459
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Explicitly clear DOTNET_BUNDLE_EXTRACT_BASE_DIR in tests that expect it is not set #92446
    area-Single-File
  • Move symbols archive out of main intermediate package #92428
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Refactor out TargetFramework concept from Microsoft.Interop.SourceGeneration #92301
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92401
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-codeflow, 8.0.0
  • Ensure Bind can handle null from GetSection #92384
    area-Extensions-Configuration
  • [llvm] Fix the IR generated for returning small valuetypes by value. #92393
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono, 9.0.0
  • Mark the ILLink test source generator as a source generator #92366
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Store pinned static fields in the Pinned Object Heap. #89895
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Avoid string allocation and improve performance of `JsonProperty.WriteTo` #90074
    area-System.Text.Json, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Make a quirk in block morphing more explicit #92292
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Fix chrome update script to use 'chromium dash', instead of 'omahaproxy' #92436
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Provide ALC name in DispatchProxy for proxies in custom ALC #92385
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Improve getExactClasses to support classes as base types #92440
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Unify on one version of the ESRP tasks #92451
    area-Infrastructure
  • [wasm] CI: trigger only wasm jobs when Webcil task has changes #92426
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [RISC-V] Replace Riscv with RiscV #92318
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Ensure that embedded broadcast checks the base type of the parent node #92414
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't produce a NuGet package for the PGO variant of the runtime pack #92438
    blocking-official-build, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Make HostModel PEUtils always read/write little endian #92441
    Servicing-approved, area-HostModel, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] Address feedback and fix some TensorPrimitives issues #92437
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [browser] Fix SIMD+EH check #92439
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Address feedback and fix some TensorPrimitives issues #92395
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Make config binding gen incremental #89587
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Clarify MatchAbbreviatedMonthName comment #92405
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix hwintrinsicChild->isContained() assert #90556
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Move TargetsCurrent to net9 and add net8 workload #91480
    area-Workloads, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo* #92396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] running tests in a "side car" thread #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Reimport full spill clique for I_IMPL<->BYREF mismatches #92307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add trim analysis warnings for delegate creation #92427
    area-Meta, linkable-framework
  • Use the native cross compilers on win-arm64 #92443
    area-Build-mono
  • HashAlgorithmName one-shots #92430
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Improve CborWriter buffer growth #92435
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • Build native windows-arm64 Mono cross-compilers #89651
    area-Build-mono
  • Permissive handling for runtimeconfig.json #92037
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • [mono][infra] Disable failing apple mobile tests #92108
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Expose an internal ISimdVector interface and being using it to deduplicate some SIMD code #90764
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [browser] WASM side-car - multi-threading proposal #91731
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Unaligned read/write only when NO_UNALIGNED_ACCESS is set #91813
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser] WASM deputy worker - multi-threading proposal #91696
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [RISC-V] regArg dependcies unrolling in genFnPrologCalleeRegArgs() #91904
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Remove duplicated marshaling of return value for JSExport #92403
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • [draft][browser] Run unit tests on multithreaded runtime with multithreaded xunit runner #91317
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, test-enhancement, os-browser
  • Allow multiple post-build steps and allow templated pre and post-build steps #92375
    area-Infrastructure
  • Create a managed implementation of assembly binder #91400
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • restore failing on Alpine arm32 #35676
  • APICompat should warn for nullable-enabled implementation of nullable-disabled base member #35667
  • dotnet publish fails on indirectly referenced "Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Web"-project #35656
  • Container tooling doesn't understand the rtm channel #35647
  • [NETSDKE2E]Publishing blazorwasm project failed with AOT compilation = true after upgrading to .NET 6.0.318(Oct update) #35645

PullRequests

Created

  • IDE0017 "Object initialization can be simplified" cleanup #35679
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0200 "Lambda expression can be removed" cleanup #35678
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • IDE0002 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35675
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Upgrade MSBuildLocator ref from 1.6.1 to 1.6.10 #35662
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • branding update for 8.0.2xx #35661
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Workload commands: JSON only output adjustments #35640
    untriaged, breaking-change, Area-Workloads, needs-breaking-change-doc-created

Merged

  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Avoid running new APIs under older TFMs #35636
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Containers: support using OCI base images. #35609
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • [wasm] Remove `UsingMicrosoftNETSdkBlazorWebAssembly` from Wasm SDK #34166
    untriaged, Area-WasmSdk
  • Fix version of targeting pack #35620
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • We don't need this 🙃 #35594
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Skip getting Windows GUI bit on non-Windows in AppHostShellShimMaker #35600
    Servicing-approved, Area-CLI, 8.0.1xx

Updated

  • IDE0049 "Name can be simplified" cleanup #35680
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update RID parsing's `LastIndexOf` call to use invariant culture #35637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2274284 #35586
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Meaningful error on runtime identifier mismatch in project.assets.json #35491
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Extension shadowing #7061
  • [Proposal]: Extensions #5497
    Working Set

PullRequests

Merged

  • Minor updates to 2023-09-20 meeting notes #7550

Updated

  • Collection expressions: Update better conversion from expression rule #7547

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `nint` and `nuint` are suggested as keywords in an attribute list #70074
  • Handle the TODO in SarifV2Logger to detect when compiler fails with an exception #70069

Closed

  • `method` is not suggested as a keyword in the attribute list for local methods #70077
  • `delegate` is suggested as a keyword for attribute lists #70076
  • CSC task of single project taking much longer #70072
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34122.69 #70080
  • Reboot build chain codegen #19505
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Workaround the deployment issue in Arcade #70090
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix issue where change namespace throws if there are duplicate Progra… #70089
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Override ChecksumSynchronizer.AddIfNeeded to not allocate an enumerator #70088
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Change AssemblyData.AvailableSymbols to ImmutableArray instead of IEnumerable #70087
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: simplify SymbolMatcher #70084
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Add a struct enumerator for NodeStateTable<T> #70082
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix official build check when publishing BCL in vsix #70081
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets: Follow user's preferred modifier order for type declaration snippets #70079
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Add a struct enumerator for WeakList<T> #70075
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix order in which flow analysis visits `foreach` #70071
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged
  • Implement support in the LSIF generator for logging to stderr #70067
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Revert "Merge pull request #69917 from CyrusNajmabadi/sgOOP2" #70066
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Move code to simpler type for interval trees #70085
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Avoid iterator allocations when creating bloom filters #70083
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not offer 'delegate' inside an attribute #70086
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove usage of elastic trivia when rewriting collections #70073
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • By default queue speedometer when insert Roslyn #70078
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused member #70062
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Add "Primary Constructors" to Compiler Test Plan.md #70050
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix PullDiagnosticCategories to DiagnosticKind mapping in DocumentPullDiagnosticHandler #70068
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, Next
  • Deflect blame away from Roslyn.Utilities.Contract on failures #70064
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Support 'wrapping' for collection expressions. #70060
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Public API for roslyn features (like CodeActions) to expose the ability to report progress as they run. #50211
    Area-IDE
  • Revert "Merge pull request #69917 from CyrusNajmabadi/sgOOP2" #70065
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • 🧹 Declare MEF dependencies of VisualStudioWorkspace #54377
    Area-IDE
  • Optimize `T ?? null` to `T` where `T` is a reference type #69803
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Avoid `null` type of pattern expression #70055
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Pattern Matching, untriaged
  • Consolidate exception stack trace reporting from analyzers #70031
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, untriaged, 17.8
  • Flip 'pull diagnostics' to be on by default. #70040
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add Primary Constructor tests for some scenarios from Test Plan #70056
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors
  • Add effective severities custom property array to error log #68892
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Initialize usage of ProjectDependencyGraph.Empty to start with a null reverseReferencesMap #70036
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: ApiCrudListProducts #50886
  • Perf regression: fortunes #50885
  • Perf improvement: updates #50884
  • Blazor forms with @formname set from Razor expressions cannot be submitted #50882
  • ASP0001 warning (UseAuthorization should appear between UseRouting and UseEndpoints is incorrectly reported when middleware is nested in app.Map #50880
  • ComputeComponentTypeNameHash does not handle multi-byte type names correctly #50879
  • [Blazor] Client diffing bug #50877
  • Maximum allowed files for Blazor InputFile component #50874
  • Deleting a component in a BWA doesn't remove it from rendering when rerunning the app in VS #50873
  • High Network Usage in Blazor Application #50872
  • Minimal API endpoints accepting IFormFile terminating with HTTP 200 for large files #50871
  • Blazor SSR Form submit on DOM events #50870
  • Perf regression: plainTextSansFilter #50869
  • IAuthorizationMiddlewareResultHandler not called #50867

Closed

  • Build throws a AD0001 Warning #50881
  • Microsoft.AspNetCore.Analyzers.RouteEmbeddedLanguage.RoutePatternAnalyzer warning when .net 8 with framework reference Microsoft.AspNetCore.App #50868
  • gRPC JSON transcoding documentation with Swagger / OpenAPI error #50177
  • Auth improvements in ASP.NET Core 8 #47286
    8.0
  • Provide a set of Blazor authentication components in the Blazor project template #48786
    8.0-rc2
  • HttpContext.Response.Headers setter changes casing of HTTP header #50763

PullRequests

Created

  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `d1467f5` to `80306a7` #50876
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Add logging to Http.Sys tests #50883
    area-networking, 8.0-rc2
  • Add Identity Components to Blazor template #50722
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 8.0-rc2

Updated

  • Avoid re-running routing for implicit middlewares and remove implicit anti-forgery #50864
    Servicing-consider, area-middleware
  • Fix Http/3 tests #50852
    area-networking
  • [release/8.0-rc2] [Blazor] Improvements to SSR component activation #50848
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Initializers fixes for Blazor Web #50860
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2274270 #50824
    area-mvc
  • [release/8.0] Update SDK version #50734
    area-infrastructure
  • Update SauceLabs Connection version #45242
    area-signalr, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Dotnet Counters + Dotnet Monitor Unification #4254
  • Dotnet Counters + Dotnet Monitor Unification - Automated `Collect` Testing #4253

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Android] RefreshView disappears when switching tabs in a TabbedPage #17592
  • [regression/8.0.0] [Android] Fix RemoveCurrentPageAndThenReAddDoesntCrash #17589
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling - Entry Next Editor #17588
  • [Android] CollectionView selection stops working when a behavior listens for LongClick events #17587
  • Maui WebAuthenticator returns back from apple signin: An error was encountered while handling the remote login #17585
  • DefaultAccessible seems to have the wrong default value #17582
  • [.net8.0.0-rc.1.9171] Grid * Row is broken on iOS #15968 #17581
  • .NET MAUI does not work with Android 13 Permissions.RequestAsync<Permissions.Camera>(); When One Time Denied From Application #17580
  • [Windows] Weird state with CarouselView #17578
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Crash on CarouselView resizing the App Window #17577
    Backlog
  • [Android] Navigation performance issue #17576
    Backlog
  • [Android] BoxView CornerRadius not working #17575
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [Windows] Wrong item size on the first item from vertical CollectionView #17574
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Wrong item size on horizontal CollectionView #17573
    Backlog
  • Performance issue while converting the datatemplate into view #17572
    Backlog
  • [Android] Border not clipping correctly content Image #17571
    .NET 8 Planning
  • MauiWebViewNavigationDelegate: PlatformView cannot be null here #17569
  • [Android] App crashes when changing tabs in Shell TabBar #17568
    Backlog
  • [Android] Effect disappearing when changing tabs on Shell TabBar #17566
    Backlog
  • When net8 app reference net7 project, breakpoint in net7 not work on Android #17564

Closed

  • RC1 File/New MAUI Blazor Hybrid gets several MA002 warnings about UseMaui and SkipValidateMauiImplicitPackageReferences #17561
    .NET 8 GA
  • [regression/8.0.0] Exception while using SetAppTheme extension #17478

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bug in EF Core 8 RC1 when optimizing models with dotnet ef dbcontext optimize #31835
  • Test execution strategies when using System.Transactions #31834

Closed

  • Fluent Api ignores supplied propertyName #31813
  • Fluent API Navigation Name incorrect #31838
  • Fluent API Navigation Name incorrect. #31837
  • Navigation Name is incorrect. #31836
  • Exception projecting value type mapped as a complex type #31609
    8.0.0
  • Complex request with external list and "except" or "all" operator could not be translated #31684
  • How to manage a generated migration that is using a delete class #31630
  • Support for Relational Properties as Parameters in Stored Procedures #31441
  • Built-in Column Encryption Capability #31832

PullRequests

Created

  • Tests for proxies with complex types #31833
  • fix to #29348 - JSON Columns produce NULL value for empty collections #31831

Merged

  • Queries for struct complex types #31828
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #31448 Use token for NonQueryResultAsync #31449
  • [TEST ONLY] Adding query test suite for optional dependent. #31830
  • [release/7.0] Fix to #29638 - GroupBy generates invalid SQL when using custom database function #31743
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.x
